paper_abstract: In this paper, the problem of stochastic stability of neutral-type neural networks with Markovian jumping parameters is considered. By choosing an mode-dependent Lyapunov-Krasovskii functional, novel delay-dependent stochastically stable conditions are derived in terms of linear matrix inequalities. Numerical examples are given to illustrate the effectiveness of the proposed approach. (c) 2013 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Delay-dependent stability for neutral-type neural networks with time-varying delays and Markovian jumping parameters
